class_notes: Section #300 is for InEmory MN semester 1 students only.
course_description: This course provides knowledge and psychomotor skills necessary for assessing patient's health status. Students will use the nursing process framework to elicit health histories and perform systematic, physical examinations in a simulation and clinical environment.
sections: Class Nbr: 3332, Section #: 300, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 2-3:50p, Instructor: H. Bussenius, Status: Open
